Newsletter.Headline: Sign up for our Newsletter
Newsletter.Description: Signing up will give you peace of mind to not miss any happenings around vvvv. Typically one mail per month.
Newsletter.IsNotEmail: Ouch. It's not a valid E-Mail Address.
